posts.post_title: Lot of 7 T206s graded- few off backs
posts.post_content:

I do have some raw cards for sale. 

Marquard hands at thighs: $165
Iron Man $150 
Frank smith Chicago $60
Mcgann Sov $60
Casey $50

Once again text or email if interested. 219-218-8414  [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url] 
Please add $4 for shipping 

Text me 219-218-8414 or email me [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url]

I have problems with uploading photos on here so email or text if interested thanks!

Could you send a scan of the McIntyre (PSA 1) to [url]lnagel@iland.net[/url] - thanks

Also - 

Posting Images to Net54 Boards:
  * Scanned image will need to be converted to .jpg – I use an old Google product called Picassa for that (there are others also)
  * I use a Free Flickr (flickr.com) account for creating online albums and then uploading scanned .jpg images to the cloud.
  * Once you have uploaded an image you will need to :
  * Select the image in your Flickr Album
  * Scroll Down to “Viewing Privacy” options and change from PRIVATE to PUBLIC
  * The scroll back up and click on “Share Photo” which will give you several options for sharing
  * I typically use “BBCODE” and copy that link over to my Net 54 post and Submit
  * Your Image(s) will now appear in your post


There are several other ways (including upload to Net54) but this has always worked for me.
Have some raw HOf and commons for sale now.
